4. Place 4 - Brenda Hughes

Place 4 - Brenda Hughes
=======================

Term
----

**May 2024 - 2026**

Brenda Hughes is a longtime Kerrville resident with extensive business and volunteer experience. Brenda and her husband Buzzie have owned and operated Buzzie’s Bar-B-Q for 27 years. Brenda’s community service includes:

* Volunteer and current board member of Hill Country CASA;
* Chair and past member of the City of Kerrville’s Food Service Advisory Board;
* Member of the County Capital Improvement Planning Committee;
* Organizer and manager of Kerr Market Days/Hill Country Swap Meet event;
* Founding member of Kerrville Pets Alive.

Brenda and Buzzie have been married for 30 years and are the proud parents and grandparents of four children and 12 grandchildren.
